version_description: Lots of exciting new features!
Lots of exciting new features!
Lots of exciting new features!
Lots of exciting new features!

In Candy Crush Friends Saga, match Candies and collect costumes with all your favorite characters from the Candy Kingdom!

We've made things even sweeter with improvements and bug fixes. Enjoy!
Minor bugfixes
Minor bugfixes

• 20 NEW levels – 300 in total
• 2 tasty NEW 3D maps! Lemonade Lake and Chocolate Mountains
• Tiffi, Jean-Luc Pecan and Misty all have a SWEET makeover
• Jean-Luc Pecan’s special ability now attacks 5 blockers in a row

• 20 NEW levels – 300 in total
• 2 tasty NEW 3D maps! Lemonade Lake and Chocolate Mountains

• Discover Bon Bon Beach with 20 NEW levels
• Retrieve the Candy Key to unlock the Mystery Chest and earn SWEET REWARDS

• 4 NEW OUTFITS to unlock
